original_text: Then the king commanded, ‘Cut the child who is alive into two pieces. Give one piece to one woman and the other piece to the other woman.’
korean_text: 왕이 이르되 산 아이를 둘로 나누어 반은 이 여자에게 주고 반은 저 여자에게 주라

sentences.original_text: Cut the child who is alive into two pieces
Give one piece to one woman
and the other piece to the other woman
